feed.title: Immich Power Tools Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Support for merging more than 5 faces
  • Option to offset date for bunch of photos
  • Potential Albums - Added sorting feature to sort by date or number of assets - Request

Fixes

  • Update Immich server port to 2283 in environment.ts by @ghostc0des in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/64
  • New Workflow for PR's and Heatmap for past one year assets by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/58
  • Feat: Heatman and versioning fixes by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/66

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.6.1...v0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.8.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.8.0

What's Changed

  • Support for merging more than 5 faces
  • Option to offset date for bunch of photos
  • Potential Albums - Added sorting feature to sort by date or number of assets - Request
  • added album list (e390984)
  • added date and asset count sorting for missing location (c28b221)

Fixes

  • Update Immich server port to 2283 in environment.ts by @ghostc0des in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/64
  • New Workflow for PR's and Heatmap for past one year assets by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/58
  • Feat: Heatman and versioning fixes by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/66
  • heatmap design fixes (7bd500b)

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.10.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.10.0

Bug Fixes

  • clean up single user page (cbfee2e)
  • tailwind fixes (4dd64aa)

Features

  • added error debug message in root layout (ac0db7a)
  • added option to filter no name people (0597f34)
  • added options to sort albums (020ef8a)
  • added people detail screen (e0dd1b9)
  • added storage drilldown in analytics (9139e82)
  • album info in header (8749d88)
  • albums page redesigned (ea38120)
  • bulk hide people from album page (1290831)
  • super charged albums page with people management tools (6b27686)
